alert.note: Alert for Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 12:54PM MST until November 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Northwest Plateau, Northwest Deserts and Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, Western Mojave Desert, Eastern Mojave Desert and Morongo Basin. In Nevada, Northeast Clark County, Las Vegas Valley, Lake Mead National Recreation Area and Southern Clark County. * WHEN...Through 4 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds will make driving difficult for motorcycles...large trucks...trailers and campers. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Mead National Recreation Area; Northwest Deserts; Northwest Plateau
